pref_keep_one_menu_open.tooltip: When enabled, the previously opened sub menu will be automatically closed.

pref_notification_max_mails.tooltip: The amount of mails to show in the detailed summary.

pref_notification_sender_max_chars.tooltip: The amount of characters at which the text in the detailed summary is truncated.

pref_notification_subject_max_chars.tooltip: The amount of characters at which the text in the detailed summary is truncated.

pref_notification_custom_template.tooltip:
A template string used to represent each mail in the notification body. The template can contain some basic Pango markup (like <b>, <i>, and <u> tags, everything else is filtered out by Cinnamon) and must contain at least one of the following placeholders:

{{sender}}: The mail sender name or address.
{{subject}}: The subject of the received mail.
{{account}}: The receiving account name as specified in Mailnag's options.

pref_logging_level.tooltip:
It enables the ability to log the output of several functions used by the extension.

Normal: Only log messages caused by non critical errors.
Verbose: Additionally log extra output messages and all HTTP responses.
Very verbose: Additionally log all method calls from all JavaScript classes/prototypes along with their execution time.

pref_debugger_enabled.tooltip: It enables the ability to catch all exceptions that under normal use would not be caught.
